about_the_game:
In KERO you play as Astel, a young frog lover whos dream is to learn everything about Rana Island's frogs. Explore and capture all the frogs to add them to your encyclopadia. Help the residents and discover the islands secrets!

Catch the frogs with your handy Capture Net.

Equip the Capture Net from your Multitool and swing it:

Head in nature to find, hunt and capture frogs. Thanks to this amazing invention, the Multitool, you can catch these magical frogs but they won't let themself get caught so easily.

Frogs with unique attacks and defenses!

Some frogs are very fearful and some are looking to make your day a nightmare:

A frog will flee when seeing you. They will sometimes also activate their defense mechanisms. Other frogs will try to knock you down and slow down your exploration.

Make yourself at home.

Help the people of Rana:

Join the first Hunters camp, learn from the inhabitants. They will also help you understand the secrets of the Island and more.

Become a Master Frog Hunter

Compete against other hunters and reach the coveted title:

There have been many hunters before you. They all wanted to write their name in history but only few could achieve this goal.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Welcome to the Rana archipelago! In KERO you can enjoy capturing unique magical frogs and add them to your collection. Learn their habit and become a master hunter.
